p: All data have been generated as part of the routine work at Assistance Publique-Hôpitaux de Marseille (Marseille university hospitals), and this study results from routine standard clinical management. Access to the patients’ biological and registry data from the hospital information system was approved by the data protection committee of Assistance Publique-Hôpitaux de Marseille (APHM). It was recorded in the European General Data Protection Regulation registry under number RGPD/APHM 2019-73. This study has been approved by our institution’s ethics committee (N°: 2020-029). The authors have no conflicts of interest to declare. Funding sources had no role in the study's design and conduct, collection, management, analysis and interpretation of the data, and preparation, review, or approval of the manuscript.
